sentences.english: The paper deals with the function of modal particles in modal category.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论情态语气范畴中语气词的功能问题。

sentences.english: The mood particle de C-selects a CP containing a Foc.
sentences.chinese: 语气词的范畴选择包含焦点标记词的CP。

sentences.english: Modal particle is an important feature of Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 语气词是汉语的一个重要特征。

sentences.english: But le2 appearing at the end of a sentence is a modal word.
sentences.chinese: “了2”用于句末，表示语气，是语气词。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper attempts to provide an interpretation of the sequences of modal particles which concurred.
sentences.chinese: 最后尝试对语气词同现的位序给予解释。

sentences.english: Chinese modal particles belong to functional auxiliary words, whose modal meanings are elusive.
sentences.chinese: 汉语语气词属功能助词，其语气义是难以捉摸的。

sentences.english: Chinese modal particle has no equivalent part of speech in English.
sentences.chinese: 英语中没有相当于汉语语气词的词类。

sentences.english: The modal particle system of southern Fujian dialect has special features.
sentences.chinese: 闽南方言语气词系统很有特色。
